Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

CHAPTER 1264 Districts and Uses Generally

1264.01Establishment of districts. 1264.02A-1 Agriculture District. 1264.03R-1 Estate-Type Residential District. 1264.04R-1A Low Density Residential Transitional District. 1264.05R-2 Low Density Residential District. 1264.055R-2A Low Density Residential Revised District. 1264.06R-3 Medium Density Residential District. 1264.065RBD Residential Business District. 1264.07B-1 Highway Business Districts. 1264.08B-2 Local Business District. 1264.09B-3 Central Business District. 1264.10B-4 Destination Business District. 1264.11M-1 Light Manufacturing District. 1264.12M-2 Heavy Manufacturing District. 1264.13PUD Planned Unit Development District. 1264.14F-P Flood Plain District. 1264.15ED Employment Center District. 1264.16O-R Office-Residential District. 1264.17O-1 Office District. 1264.18O-2 Office Park District. 1264.19Town Center Overlay Zone. 1264.20ADD-1, Austin Development District 1. 1264.21ADD-2, Austin Development District 2.

CROSS REFERENCES

Division of municipal corporations into zones - see Ohio R.C. 713.06

Basis of districts; classification of buildings and structures - see Ohio R.C. 713.10

Official Zoning Map - see P. & Z. Ch. 1266

Nonconforming uses - see P. & Z. Ch. 1278
